    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
                 window.showMobileBanner = function(){
                     var banner = $('#js_mobile_banner');
                     if(!banner.length || bcrm.prototype.settings.btag ==='admitad') return;
                     var isAndroid = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i) != null;
                     var isIOS = navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone|iPad|iPod/i) != null;
                     if((isAndroid || isIOS) && !readCookie('mobile_banner_closed'))
                         setTimeout(function () {
 
                             $('.js_mobile_app', banner).hide();
                             if (isAndroid) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="google-play"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
                             else if (isIOS) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="ios"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
 
                             banner.animate({'bottom': '0'}, 300, function () {
                                 $('.js_mobile_banner_close', banner).click(function () {
                                     createCookie('mobile_banner_closed', true);
                                     banner.animate({'bottom': '-128px'}, 300);
                                 });
                             });
                         }, 1000);
                 }
                 if(navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i)){window.showMobileBanner();}
             });
   </script>

     });

     createCookie('fingerId', fpid, 3650);
 }

     var counter = 1;
     function checkIfAnalyticsLoaded() {
        if ($.isFunction(window.ga) && $.isFunction(window.ga.getAll)) {
            createCookie('gaClientId', window.ga.getAll()[0].get('clientId'), 3650);
        } else {
            counter = counter + 1;
            if (counter < 10){
                setTimeout('checkIfAnalyticsLoaded()', 400);
            }
        }
     }

    <div class="modal-dialog custom-margin">
     <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-header">
       <button aria-label="Close" class="btn-close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
        <i class="icon-header-close">
        </i>
       </button>
      </div>

   <script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
 
         var affiliateIframe = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal');
         var affiliateLink = 'https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login?ReturnUrl=%2faffiliate-portal/';
         var iframeContext = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal').contentDocument; 
         var affiliateHomeLink = "https://economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Home/";
         var iframe_affil = $('iframe.affiliate_portal');
         function initIframeButtons() {
             $('.affiliate_portal').contents().find('#loginForm a[type="submit"]').click(function(){
                 window.location.href = "https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/ResetPassword/";
             });
         };
 
         $("#js_affiliate_portal a").click(function(){
                iframe_affil.attr("src",affiliateLink);
                 $(window).resize(function(){
                     if($('#AffiliatePortal').width() < 660){
                         $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('hide');
                     }
                 });
                 
                 if(iframeContext &&(iframeContext.cookie).indexOf('.ASPXAUTH') !== -1){
                     window.location.href = affiliateHomeLink;
                 };
                 initIframeButtons();
                 $(affiliateIframe).on('load',function(){
                     if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href.indexOf('https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login') === -1 ){
                         window.location.href = affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href;
                     } 
                     initIframeButtons();
                 });
 
                 if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href !== affiliateLink){
                     affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href = affiliateLink;
                 } 
 
                 $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('show');
             
         });
     });
   </script>

     var selected = {"code":"DE","phoneCode":49,"id":81,"name":"Deutschland","p":240,"lang":"de","selected":true,"wrap":"start"};
 
     
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r = $('.js_settings_popup_cor', popup);
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     r.delegate('.js_popup_item', 'click', function(){
         var cor = $(this).data('item');
         var lang = (corAll[cor].lang) ? corAll[cor].lang : 'en';
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
         var countryCurrencies = bcrm.getCountryCurrency();
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         for (var curr in countryCurrencies) {
             if (countryCurrencies.hasOwnProperty(curr) && $.inArray(cor, countryCurrencies[curr]) != -1) {
                 var crCurr = curr;
             }
         }
 
         if(typeof crCurr == 'undefined'){
             crCurr = 'EUR';
         }
 
         $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', crCurr);
 
         self.settingsPopup = {
             cr : cor,
             lang : lang,
             curr : crCurr,
             dest : dest
         };
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r).removeClass('picked');
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
 
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         var langPicked = $('.js_popup_item[data-item="'+lang+'"]:first', r_lang);
         var currPicked = $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item[data-item="'+crCurr+'"]');
         langPicked.addClass('picked');
         currPicked.addClass('picked');
 
         $('.js_settings_cor_title', popup).text(corAll[cor].name);
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text(langPicked.data('name'));
         if(currPicked.data('name'))
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text(currPicked.data('name'));
 
     });
 
 
     $(document).ready(function(){
         if(selected) {
             $('.js_settings_cor_title').text(selected.name);
             $('.js_settings_cor_flag').addClass(selected.code.toLowerCase());
             $('.js_settings_cor_txt').text(selected.code.toUpperCase());
         }
 
     });
          </script>
         </div>

 
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).click(function(){
         self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
         var lang = $(this).data('item');
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         self.settingsPopup.lang = lang;
         self.settingsPopup.dest = dest;
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
     });
 
 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        languageAction();
 
        $('.js_language_short').text(lang1.toUpperCase());
        $('.js_settings_lang_title').text(name);
        $('.js_language_flag').addClass(lang1);
    });

     <script>
      window.onload = function() {
       
             $("#js_cookies-popup-agree").bind("click",function(){
             $(".js_cookie-popup").hide();
             createCookie("agreedToCookies","true");
             });
             if(readCookie("agreedToCookies") === null){
                 $(".js_cookie-popup").show();
             }
         
     }

     <script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function(){
                     var loadPartners = function(){
                         $(window).unbind("scroll");
                         $(window).unbind("resize");
                         setTimeout(function () {
                             $.ajax({
                                 url: "partner_feedback_print_html",
                                 cache: false,
                                 success: function (html) {
                                     $(".js_feedback_cont").html(html);
                                 }
                             });
                         }, 50);
                     };
                     var initPartnersLoading = function(){
                         var feedbackWrap = $(".js_feedback_cont");
                         var boxTopPositon =  feedbackWrap[0].getBoundingClientRect().top;
                         if (!feedbackWrap.length){
                             $(window).unbind("scroll");
                             $(window).unbind("resize");
                             return;
                         }
                         var windowHeight = $(window).height();
 
                         if (boxTopPositon < windowHeight){
                             loadPartners();
                         }
                     };
                 
                     $(window).bind("scroll", initPartnersLoading);
                     $(window).bind("resize", initPartnersLoading);
                     initPartnersLoading();
                     BcrmApiWrapper.getAvgCustomerRating(populateAvgRating, 21);
                 });
     </script>

        <script>
         var lang = 'de';
 var dNumber = '+44 203 478 5239';
 var jdata = '[{"id":233,"code":"UK","phone":"+44 203 478 5239","name":"UK"},{"id":81,"code":"DE","phone":"800 180 40 08","name":"Germany"},{"id":231,"code":"UA","phone":"800 50 11 47","name":"Ukraine"},{"id":183,"code":"RU","phone":"+7 495 989 9858","name":"Russia"},{"id":207,"code":"ES","phone":"+34 9 1791 1261","name":"Spain"},{"id":177,"code":"PL","phone":"+48 2 2212 0618","name":"Poland"},{"id":108,"code":"IT","phone":"+39 06 4523 0451","name":"Italy"},{"id":121,"code":"LV","phone":"+371 6 601 0858","name":"Latvia"},{"id":107,"code":"IL","phone":"+972 3721 9636","name":"Israel"},{"id":14,"code":"AU","phone":"+61 280 733 414","name":"Austria"},{"id":213,"code":"SE","phone":"+46 8 5051 3532","name":"Sweden"},{"id":74,"code":"FR","phone":"+33 17 09 186 12","name":"France"},{"id":31,"code":"BR","phone":"+55 613 717 51 11","name":"Brazil"},{"id":98,"code":"HK","phone":"+852 580 859 11","name":"Hong Kong"},{"id":39,"code":"CA","phone":"+1 613 701 09 11","name":"Canada"},{"id":214,"code":"CH","phone":"+41 315 280 911","name":"Switzerland"},{"id":22,"code":"BE","phone":"+32 258 849 11","name":"Belgium"},{"id":[234,10,11,27,44,48,53,56,62,63,65,76,87,89,94,97,138,142,159,171,173,174,179,185,189,236,239],"code":"US","phone":"1 202 800 9938","name":"USA"}]';
 var region = 'EU';
 var url = '/de';
 var abTesting = +'0';
 var abTestingExpId = '5sUuKLSySv-DJ9TF5df-vg';
 
 
     $(document).ready(function() {
         var isTest = document.location.hostname !== 'www.economybookings.com';
         var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i) != null;
 
 
         window.expVar = abTesting;
         window.expId = abTestingExpId;
 
         window.bcrmSettings = {
             proxyUrl: '/prx.php',
             language: lang,
             watermarkAutocomplite : true,
             calendarDateFormat: 'dd M',
             searchResultUrl : url+'/cars/results',
             jsErrorHandlerUrl : '/qjs.php?m=e',
 
             shortTimeFormat: [234],
             calendarFirstDay : [234, 235],
             pickupDaysFromNow: 4,
             currencyInSettings: true,
             plusCalendarPickupForDropoff: 4,
             showAlertInSearchForm: false,
             dropoffDaysFromNow: 8,
             addVtoCss: true,
             defaultTime: '1000',
             isHoverFlexBox: true,
             sortByScoreOnly : false,
             corsOn12Steps: false,
             isQueryParam : true,
             method : 'showSearch',
             newCalendar : abTesting === 1,
             defaultAutocomplite : getDefaultForAutoCompletePage(),
             showCalendarAfterPickLocation : true
         };
 
 
         var inst = bcrm(window.bcrmSettings);
         if (window.bcrmSettings.method) inst[window.bcrmSettings.method]();
 
         showSupportPhoneNumber(dNumber, jdata);
 
         bcrm.bind('user_identified', function (r, data) {
             if (data['code'] == 'US' || data['code'] == 'CA' || data['code'] == 'AG' || data['code'] == 'AR' || data['code'] == 'BS' || data['code'] == 'BB' || data['code'] == 'BZ' || data['code'] == 'BO' || data['code'] == 'BR' || data['code'] == 'VE' || data['code'] == 'HT' || data['code'] == 'GY' || data['code'] == 'GT' || data['code'] == 'GD' || data['code'] == 'HN' || data['code'] == 'DM' || data['code'] == 'DO' || data['code'] == 'CO' || data['code'] == 'CR' || data['code'] == 'CU' || data['code'] == 'MX' || data['code'] == 'NI' || data['code'] == 'PA' || data['code'] == 'PY' || data['code'] == 'PE' || data['code'] == 'SV' || data['code'] == 'VC' || data['code'] == 'KN' || data['code'] == 'LC' || data['code'] == 'SR' || data['code'] == 'TT' || data['code'] == 'UY' || data['code'] == 'CL' || data['code'] == 'EC' || data['code'] == 'JM') {
                 $("#world-phone-number").hide();
                 $("#usa-phone-number").show();
             }
         });
 
         var modalPopup = $('#SignIn');
         if(modalPopup.length && getParameterByName('op') === 'reg') {
             $('.login_form_show:first').click();
             if(getParameterByName('mail')){
                 $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(getParameterByName('mail'));
             }else{
                 if(!readCookie('clientId')) createCookie('clientId', getParameterByName('clientid'), 3650);
                 var clientId = readCookie('clientId');
                 if(clientId)
                     bcrm.getJSON(inst.settings.proxyUrl + '&m=s&c=getclientemailbyclientid/' + clientId, function (data) {
                         if(data.Email){
                             $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(data.Email);
                         }
                     });
             }
         }
 
         bcrm.bind('search_form_loaded', function (r) {
             /*BcrmApiWrapper.getReviews(0, getReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getFeefoReviews(getFeefoReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getKiyohReviews(getKiyohReviews);*/
 
 
 
             if (inst.settings.searchFormTmpl) {
                 dataLayerForFirst('autocomplete', lang , region);
             }
             else{
                 dataLayerForFirst('dropdown', lang , region);
             }
 
             bcrm.bind("currencies_loaded", function () {
                 $('.lrv_offer:first').click();
             });
 
         });
 
     });
        </script>
        <div id="bcrm_currency_cont" style="display:none">
         <div class="group main">
          <span class="main-title">
           Währung
          </span>
          <div class="bcrm_currency_settings_popular">
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="group all-other">
          <span class="sub-title">
           Alle Währungen:
          </span>
          <div class="bcrm_currency_settings_other">
          </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         var lang = 'de';
 
     
 
         var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
         popup.delegate('.bcrm_currency_settings_item', 'click', function(){
             self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
             var curr = $(this).data('item');
 
             $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
             $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
             self.settingsPopup.curr = curr;
             self.settingsPopup.lang = (self.settingsPopup.lang) ? self.settingsPopup.lang : lang;
             $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', curr);
 
             $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
             $(this).addClass('picked');
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
         });
        </script>

   <script>
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
                 window.showMobileBanner = function(){
                     var banner = $('#js_mobile_banner');
                     if(!banner.length || bcrm.prototype.settings.btag ==='admitad') return;
                     var isAndroid = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i) != null;
                     var isIOS = navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone|iPad|iPod/i) != null;
                     if((isAndroid || isIOS) && !readCookie('mobile_banner_closed'))
                         setTimeout(function () {
 
                             $('.js_mobile_app', banner).hide();
                             if (isAndroid) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="google-play"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
                             else if (isIOS) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="ios"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
 
                             banner.animate({'bottom': '0'}, 300, function () {
                                 $('.js_mobile_banner_close', banner).click(function () {
                                     createCookie('mobile_banner_closed', true);
                                     banner.animate({'bottom': '-128px'}, 300);
                                 });
                             });
                         }, 1000);
                 }
                 if(navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i)){window.showMobileBanner();}
             });
   </script>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var cFinger = readCookie('fingerId');
 
 if(cFinger == undefined || cFinger == 0) {
     var options = {
         //excludeUserAgent: true,
         ie_activex: true
     }
     var fip = {};
     new Fingerprint2(options).get(function(result, components){
         fip.id = result;
     });
     var fpid = (fip.id) ? fip.id : 0;
     createCookie('fingerId', fpid, 3650);
 }
 
 
 var cGaId = readCookie('gaClientId');
 if(cGaId == undefined || cGaId == 0) {
     var counter = 1;
     function checkIfAnalyticsLoaded() {
        if ($.isFunction(window.ga) && $.isFunction(window.ga.getAll)) {
            createCookie('gaClientId', window.ga.getAll()[0].get('clientId'), 3650);
        } else {
            counter = counter + 1;
            if (counter < 10){
                setTimeout('checkIfAnalyticsLoaded()', 400);
            }
        }
     }
     var isFrontPage = '1';
     var carRental = testCarRentalPage();

   <div aria-hidden="false" class="modal custom-popup fade" id="AffiliatePortal" style="display: none">
    <div class="modal-dialog custom-margin">
     <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-header">
       <button aria-label="Close" class="btn-close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
        <i class="icon-header-close">
        </i>
       </button>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">
       <iframe class="affiliate_portal" src="about:blank">
       </iframe>

   <script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
 
         var affiliateIframe = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal');
         var affiliateLink = 'https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login?ReturnUrl=%2faffiliate-portal/';
         var iframeContext = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal').contentDocument; 
         var affiliateHomeLink = "https://economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Home/";
         var iframe_affil = $('iframe.affiliate_portal');
         function initIframeButtons() {
             $('.affiliate_portal').contents().find('#loginForm a[type="submit"]').click(function(){
                 window.location.href = "https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/ResetPassword/";
             });
         };
 
         $("#js_affiliate_portal a").click(function(){
                iframe_affil.attr("src",affiliateLink);
                 $(window).resize(function(){
                     if($('#AffiliatePortal').width() < 660){
                         $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('hide');
                     }
                 });
                 
                 if(iframeContext &&(iframeContext.cookie).indexOf('.ASPXAUTH') !== -1){
                     window.location.href = affiliateHomeLink;
                 };
                 initIframeButtons();
                 $(affiliateIframe).on('load',function(){
                     if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href.indexOf('https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login') === -1 ){
                         window.location.href = affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href;
                     } 
                     initIframeButtons();
                 });
 
                 if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href !== affiliateLink){
                     affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href = affiliateLink;
                 } 
 
                 $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('show');
             
         });
     });
   </script>

     var selected = {"code":"DE","phoneCode":49,"id":81,"name":"Deutschland","p":240,"lang":"de","selected":true,"wrap":"start"};
 
     
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r = $('.js_settings_popup_cor', popup);
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     r.delegate('.js_popup_item', 'click', function(){
         var cor = $(this).data('item');
         var lang = (corAll[cor].lang) ? corAll[cor].lang : 'en';
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
         var countryCurrencies = bcrm.getCountryCurrency();
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         for (var curr in countryCurrencies) {
             if (countryCurrencies.hasOwnProperty(curr) && $.inArray(cor, countryCurrencies[curr]) != -1) {
                 var crCurr = curr;
             }
         }
 
         if(typeof crCurr == 'undefined'){
             crCurr = 'EUR';
         }
 
         $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', crCurr);
 
         self.settingsPopup = {
             cr : cor,
             lang : lang,
             curr : crCurr,
             dest : dest
         };
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r).removeClass('picked');
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
 
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         var langPicked = $('.js_popup_item[data-item="'+lang+'"]:first', r_lang);
         var currPicked = $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item[data-item="'+crCurr+'"]');
         langPicked.addClass('picked');
         currPicked.addClass('picked');
 
         $('.js_settings_cor_title', popup).text(corAll[cor].name);
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text(langPicked.data('name'));
         if(currPicked.data('name'))
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text(currPicked.data('name'));
 
     });
 
 
     $(document).ready(function(){
         if(selected) {
             $('.js_settings_cor_title').text(selected.name);
             $('.js_settings_cor_flag').addClass(selected.code.toLowerCase());
             $('.js_settings_cor_txt').text(selected.code.toUpperCase());
         }
 
     });
          </script>

 
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).click(function(){
         self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
         var lang = $(this).data('item');
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         self.settingsPopup.lang = lang;
         self.settingsPopup.dest = dest;
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
     });

        languageAction();
 
        $('.js_language_short').text(lang1.toUpperCase());
        $('.js_settings_lang_title').text(name);
        $('.js_language_flag').addClass(lang1);
    });

     <script>
      window.onload = function() {
       
             $("#js_cookies-popup-agree").bind("click",function(){
             $(".js_cookie-popup").hide();
             createCookie("agreedToCookies","true");
             });
             if(readCookie("agreedToCookies") === null){
                 $(".js_cookie-popup").show();
             }
         
     }
     </script>

     <script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function(){
                     var loadPartners = function(){
                         $(window).unbind("scroll");
                         $(window).unbind("resize");
                         setTimeout(function () {
                             $.ajax({
                                 url: "partner_feedback_print_html",
                                 cache: false,
                                 success: function (html) {
                                     $(".js_feedback_cont").html(html);
                                 }
                             });
                         }, 50);
                     };
                     var initPartnersLoading = function(){
                         var feedbackWrap = $(".js_feedback_cont");
                         var boxTopPositon =  feedbackWrap[0].getBoundingClientRect().top;
                         if (!feedbackWrap.length){
                             $(window).unbind("scroll");
                             $(window).unbind("resize");
                             return;
                         }
                         var windowHeight = $(window).height();
 
                         if (boxTopPositon < windowHeight){
                             loadPartners();
                         }
                     };
                 
                     $(window).bind("scroll", initPartnersLoading);
                     $(window).bind("resize", initPartnersLoading);
                     initPartnersLoading();
                     BcrmApiWrapper.getAvgCustomerRating(populateAvgRating, 21);
                 });
     </script>

        <script>
         var lang = 'de';
 var dNumber = '+44 203 478 5239';
 var jdata = '[{"id":233,"code":"UK","phone":"+44 203 478 5239","name":"UK"},{"id":81,"code":"DE","phone":"800 180 40 08","name":"Germany"},{"id":231,"code":"UA","phone":"800 50 11 47","name":"Ukraine"},{"id":183,"code":"RU","phone":"+7 495 989 9858","name":"Russia"},{"id":207,"code":"ES","phone":"+34 9 1791 1261","name":"Spain"},{"id":177,"code":"PL","phone":"+48 2 2212 0618","name":"Poland"},{"id":108,"code":"IT","phone":"+39 06 4523 0451","name":"Italy"},{"id":121,"code":"LV","phone":"+371 6 601 0858","name":"Latvia"},{"id":107,"code":"IL","phone":"+972 3721 9636","name":"Israel"},{"id":14,"code":"AU","phone":"+61 280 733 414","name":"Austria"},{"id":213,"code":"SE","phone":"+46 8 5051 3532","name":"Sweden"},{"id":74,"code":"FR","phone":"+33 17 09 186 12","name":"France"},{"id":31,"code":"BR","phone":"+55 613 717 51 11","name":"Brazil"},{"id":98,"code":"HK","phone":"+852 580 859 11","name":"Hong Kong"},{"id":39,"code":"CA","phone":"+1 613 701 09 11","name":"Canada"},{"id":214,"code":"CH","phone":"+41 315 280 911","name":"Switzerland"},{"id":22,"code":"BE","phone":"+32 258 849 11","name":"Belgium"},{"id":[234,10,11,27,44,48,53,56,62,63,65,76,87,89,94,97,138,142,159,171,173,174,179,185,189,236,239],"code":"US","phone":"1 202 800 9938","name":"USA"}]';
 var region = 'EU';
 var url = '/de';
 var abTesting = +'0';
 var abTestingExpId = '5sUuKLSySv-DJ9TF5df-vg';
 
 
     $(document).ready(function() {
         var isTest = document.location.hostname !== 'www.economybookings.com';
         var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i) != null;
 
 
         window.expVar = abTesting;
         window.expId = abTestingExpId;
 
         window.bcrmSettings = {
             proxyUrl: '/prx.php',
             language: lang,
             watermarkAutocomplite : true,
             calendarDateFormat: 'dd M',
             searchResultUrl : url+'/cars/results',
             jsErrorHandlerUrl : '/qjs.php?m=e',
 
             shortTimeFormat: [234],
             calendarFirstDay : [234, 235],
             pickupDaysFromNow: 4,
             currencyInSettings: true,
             plusCalendarPickupForDropoff: 4,
             showAlertInSearchForm: false,
             dropoffDaysFromNow: 8,
             addVtoCss: true,
             defaultTime: '1000',
             isHoverFlexBox: true,
             sortByScoreOnly : false,
             corsOn12Steps: false,
             isQueryParam : true,
             method : 'showSearch',
             newCalendar : abTesting === 1,
             defaultAutocomplite : getDefaultForAutoCompletePage(),
             showCalendarAfterPickLocation : true
         };
 
 
         var inst = bcrm(window.bcrmSettings);
         if (window.bcrmSettings.method) inst[window.bcrmSettings.method]();
 
         showSupportPhoneNumber(dNumber, jdata);
 
         bcrm.bind('user_identified', function (r, data) {
             if (data['code'] == 'US' || data['code'] == 'CA' || data['code'] == 'AG' || data['code'] == 'AR' || data['code'] == 'BS' || data['code'] == 'BB' || data['code'] == 'BZ' || data['code'] == 'BO' || data['code'] == 'BR' || data['code'] == 'VE' || data['code'] == 'HT' || data['code'] == 'GY' || data['code'] == 'GT' || data['code'] == 'GD' || data['code'] == 'HN' || data['code'] == 'DM' || data['code'] == 'DO' || data['code'] == 'CO' || data['code'] == 'CR' || data['code'] == 'CU' || data['code'] == 'MX' || data['code'] == 'NI' || data['code'] == 'PA' || data['code'] == 'PY' || data['code'] == 'PE' || data['code'] == 'SV' || data['code'] == 'VC' || data['code'] == 'KN' || data['code'] == 'LC' || data['code'] == 'SR' || data['code'] == 'TT' || data['code'] == 'UY' || data['code'] == 'CL' || data['code'] == 'EC' || data['code'] == 'JM') {
                 $("#world-phone-number").hide();
                 $("#usa-phone-number").show();
             }
         });
 
         var modalPopup = $('#SignIn');
         if(modalPopup.length && getParameterByName('op') === 'reg') {
             $('.login_form_show:first').click();
             if(getParameterByName('mail')){
                 $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(getParameterByName('mail'));
             }else{
                 if(!readCookie('clientId')) createCookie('clientId', getParameterByName('clientid'), 3650);
                 var clientId = readCookie('clientId');
                 if(clientId)
                     bcrm.getJSON(inst.settings.proxyUrl + '&m=s&c=getclientemailbyclientid/' + clientId, function (data) {
                         if(data.Email){
                             $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(data.Email);
                         }
                     });
             }
         }
 
         bcrm.bind('search_form_loaded', function (r) {
             /*BcrmApiWrapper.getReviews(0, getReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getFeefoReviews(getFeefoReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getKiyohReviews(getKiyohReviews);*/
 
 
 
             if (inst.settings.searchFormTmpl) {
                 dataLayerForFirst('autocomplete', lang , region);
             }
             else{
                 dataLayerForFirst('dropdown', lang , region);
             }
 
             bcrm.bind("currencies_loaded", function () {
                 $('.lrv_offer:first').click();
             });
 
         });
 
     });
        </script>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         var lang = 'de';
 
     
 
         var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
         popup.delegate('.bcrm_currency_settings_item', 'click', function(){
             self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
             var curr = $(this).data('item');
 
             $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
             $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
             self.settingsPopup.curr = curr;
             self.settingsPopup.lang = (self.settingsPopup.lang) ? self.settingsPopup.lang : lang;
             $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', curr);
 
             $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
             $(this).addClass('picked');
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
         });
        </script>

   <script>
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
                 window.showMobileBanner = function(){
                     var banner = $('#js_mobile_banner');
                     if(!banner.length || bcrm.prototype.settings.btag ==='admitad') return;
                     var isAndroid = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i) != null;
                     var isIOS = navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone|iPad|iPod/i) != null;
                     if((isAndroid || isIOS) && !readCookie('mobile_banner_closed'))
                         setTimeout(function () {
 
                             $('.js_mobile_app', banner).hide();
                             if (isAndroid) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="google-play"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
                             else if (isIOS) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="ios"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
 
                             banner.animate({'bottom': '0'}, 300, function () {
                                 $('.js_mobile_banner_close', banner).click(function () {
                                     createCookie('mobile_banner_closed', true);
                                     banner.animate({'bottom': '-128px'}, 300);
                                 });
                             });
                         }, 1000);
                 }
                 if(navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i)){window.showMobileBanner();}
             });
   </script>
   <title>
    Günstige Autovermietung in Europa und weltweit

    <div class="modal-dialog custom-margin">
     <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-header">
       <button aria-label="Close" class="btn-close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
        <i class="icon-header-close">
        </i>
       </button>

   <script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
 
         var affiliateIframe = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal');
         var affiliateLink = 'https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login?ReturnUrl=%2faffiliate-portal/';
         var iframeContext = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal').contentDocument; 
         var affiliateHomeLink = "https://economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Home/";
         var iframe_affil = $('iframe.affiliate_portal');
         function initIframeButtons() {
             $('.affiliate_portal').contents().find('#loginForm a[type="submit"]').click(function(){
                 window.location.href = "https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/ResetPassword/";
             });
         };
 
         $("#js_affiliate_portal a").click(function(){
                iframe_affil.attr("src",affiliateLink);
                 $(window).resize(function(){
                     if($('#AffiliatePortal').width() < 660){
                         $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('hide');
                     }
                 });
                 
                 if(iframeContext &&(iframeContext.cookie).indexOf('.ASPXAUTH') !== -1){
                     window.location.href = affiliateHomeLink;
                 };
                 initIframeButtons();
                 $(affiliateIframe).on('load',function(){
                     if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href.indexOf('https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login') === -1 ){
                         window.location.href = affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href;
                     } 
                     initIframeButtons();
                 });
 
                 if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href !== affiliateLink){
                     affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href = affiliateLink;
                 } 
 
                 $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('show');
             
         });
     });
   </script>

             for more benefits!

     var selected = {"code":"DE","phoneCode":49,"id":81,"name":"Deutschland","p":240,"lang":"de","selected":true,"wrap":"start"};
 
     
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r = $('.js_settings_popup_cor', popup);
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     r.delegate('.js_popup_item', 'click', function(){
         var cor = $(this).data('item');
         var lang = (corAll[cor].lang) ? corAll[cor].lang : 'en';
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
         var countryCurrencies = bcrm.getCountryCurrency();
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         for (var curr in countryCurrencies) {
             if (countryCurrencies.hasOwnProperty(curr) && $.inArray(cor, countryCurrencies[curr]) != -1) {
                 var crCurr = curr;
             }
         }
 
         if(typeof crCurr == 'undefined'){
             crCurr = 'EUR';
         }
 
         $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', crCurr);
 
         self.settingsPopup = {
             cr : cor,
             lang : lang,
             curr : crCurr,
             dest : dest
         };
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r).removeClass('picked');
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
 
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         var langPicked = $('.js_popup_item[data-item="'+lang+'"]:first', r_lang);
         var currPicked = $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item[data-item="'+crCurr+'"]');
         langPicked.addClass('picked');
         currPicked.addClass('picked');
 
         $('.js_settings_cor_title', popup).text(corAll[cor].name);
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text(langPicked.data('name'));
         if(currPicked.data('name'))
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text(currPicked.data('name'));
 
     });
 
 
     $(document).ready(function(){
         if(selected) {
             $('.js_settings_cor_title').text(selected.name);
             $('.js_settings_cor_flag').addClass(selected.code.toLowerCase());
             $('.js_settings_cor_txt').text(selected.code.toUpperCase());
         }
 
     });
          </script>
         </div>

 
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).click(function(){
         self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
         var lang = $(this).data('item');
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         self.settingsPopup.lang = lang;
         self.settingsPopup.dest = dest;
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
     });
 
 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        languageAction();
 
        $('.js_language_short').text(lang1.toUpperCase());
        $('.js_settings_lang_title').text(name);
        $('.js_language_flag').addClass(lang1);
    });

     <script>
      window.onload = function() {
       
             $("#js_cookies-popup-agree").bind("click",function(){
             $(".js_cookie-popup").hide();
             createCookie("agreedToCookies","true");
             });
             if(readCookie("agreedToCookies") === null){
                 $(".js_cookie-popup").show();
             }
         
     }

     <script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function(){
                     var loadPartners = function(){
                         $(window).unbind("scroll");
                         $(window).unbind("resize");
                         setTimeout(function () {
                             $.ajax({
                                 url: "partner_feedback_print_html",
                                 cache: false,
                                 success: function (html) {
                                     $(".js_feedback_cont").html(html);
                                 }
                             });
                         }, 50);
                     };
                     var initPartnersLoading = function(){
                         var feedbackWrap = $(".js_feedback_cont");
                         var boxTopPositon =  feedbackWrap[0].getBoundingClientRect().top;
                         if (!feedbackWrap.length){
                             $(window).unbind("scroll");
                             $(window).unbind("resize");
                             return;
                         }
                         var windowHeight = $(window).height();
 
                         if (boxTopPositon < windowHeight){
                             loadPartners();
                         }
                     };
                 
                     $(window).bind("scroll", initPartnersLoading);
                     $(window).bind("resize", initPartnersLoading);
                     initPartnersLoading();
                     BcrmApiWrapper.getAvgCustomerRating(populateAvgRating, 21);
                 });
     </script>

        <script>
         var lang = 'de';
 var dNumber = '+44 203 478 5239';
 var jdata = '[{"id":233,"code":"UK","phone":"+44 203 478 5239","name":"UK"},{"id":81,"code":"DE","phone":"800 180 40 08","name":"Germany"},{"id":231,"code":"UA","phone":"800 50 11 47","name":"Ukraine"},{"id":183,"code":"RU","phone":"+7 495 989 9858","name":"Russia"},{"id":207,"code":"ES","phone":"+34 9 1791 1261","name":"Spain"},{"id":177,"code":"PL","phone":"+48 2 2212 0618","name":"Poland"},{"id":108,"code":"IT","phone":"+39 06 4523 0451","name":"Italy"},{"id":121,"code":"LV","phone":"+371 6 601 0858","name":"Latvia"},{"id":107,"code":"IL","phone":"+972 3721 9636","name":"Israel"},{"id":14,"code":"AU","phone":"+61 280 733 414","name":"Austria"},{"id":213,"code":"SE","phone":"+46 8 5051 3532","name":"Sweden"},{"id":74,"code":"FR","phone":"+33 17 09 186 12","name":"France"},{"id":31,"code":"BR","phone":"+55 613 717 51 11","name":"Brazil"},{"id":98,"code":"HK","phone":"+852 580 859 11","name":"Hong Kong"},{"id":39,"code":"CA","phone":"+1 613 701 09 11","name":"Canada"},{"id":214,"code":"CH","phone":"+41 315 280 911","name":"Switzerland"},{"id":22,"code":"BE","phone":"+32 258 849 11","name":"Belgium"},{"id":[234,10,11,27,44,48,53,56,62,63,65,76,87,89,94,97,138,142,159,171,173,174,179,185,189,236,239],"code":"US","phone":"1 202 800 9938","name":"USA"}]';
 var region = 'EU';
 var url = '/de';
 var abTesting = +'0';
 var abTestingExpId = '5sUuKLSySv-DJ9TF5df-vg';
 
 
     $(document).ready(function() {
         var isTest = document.location.hostname !== 'www.economybookings.com';
         var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i) != null;
 
 
         window.expVar = abTesting;
         window.expId = abTestingExpId;
 
         window.bcrmSettings = {
             proxyUrl: '/prx.php',
             language: lang,
             watermarkAutocomplite : true,
             calendarDateFormat: 'dd M',
             searchResultUrl : url+'/cars/results',
             jsErrorHandlerUrl : '/qjs.php?m=e',
 
             shortTimeFormat: [234],
             calendarFirstDay : [234, 235],
             pickupDaysFromNow: 4,
             currencyInSettings: true,
             plusCalendarPickupForDropoff: 4,
             showAlertInSearchForm: false,
             dropoffDaysFromNow: 8,
             addVtoCss: true,
             defaultTime: '1000',
             isHoverFlexBox: true,
             sortByScoreOnly : false,
             corsOn12Steps: false,
             isQueryParam : true,
             method : 'showSearch',
             newCalendar : abTesting === 1,
             defaultAutocomplite : getDefaultForAutoCompletePage(),
             showCalendarAfterPickLocation : true
         };
 
 
         var inst = bcrm(window.bcrmSettings);
         if (window.bcrmSettings.method) inst[window.bcrmSettings.method]();
 
         showSupportPhoneNumber(dNumber, jdata);
 
         bcrm.bind('user_identified', function (r, data) {
             if (data['code'] == 'US' || data['code'] == 'CA' || data['code'] == 'AG' || data['code'] == 'AR' || data['code'] == 'BS' || data['code'] == 'BB' || data['code'] == 'BZ' || data['code'] == 'BO' || data['code'] == 'BR' || data['code'] == 'VE' || data['code'] == 'HT' || data['code'] == 'GY' || data['code'] == 'GT' || data['code'] == 'GD' || data['code'] == 'HN' || data['code'] == 'DM' || data['code'] == 'DO' || data['code'] == 'CO' || data['code'] == 'CR' || data['code'] == 'CU' || data['code'] == 'MX' || data['code'] == 'NI' || data['code'] == 'PA' || data['code'] == 'PY' || data['code'] == 'PE' || data['code'] == 'SV' || data['code'] == 'VC' || data['code'] == 'KN' || data['code'] == 'LC' || data['code'] == 'SR' || data['code'] == 'TT' || data['code'] == 'UY' || data['code'] == 'CL' || data['code'] == 'EC' || data['code'] == 'JM') {
                 $("#world-phone-number").hide();
                 $("#usa-phone-number").show();
             }
         });
 
         var modalPopup = $('#SignIn');
         if(modalPopup.length && getParameterByName('op') === 'reg') {
             $('.login_form_show:first').click();
             if(getParameterByName('mail')){
                 $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(getParameterByName('mail'));
             }else{
                 if(!readCookie('clientId')) createCookie('clientId', getParameterByName('clientid'), 3650);
                 var clientId = readCookie('clientId');
                 if(clientId)
                     bcrm.getJSON(inst.settings.proxyUrl + '&m=s&c=getclientemailbyclientid/' + clientId, function (data) {
                         if(data.Email){
                             $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(data.Email);
                         }
                     });
             }
         }
 
         bcrm.bind('search_form_loaded', function (r) {
             /*BcrmApiWrapper.getReviews(0, getReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getFeefoReviews(getFeefoReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getKiyohReviews(getKiyohReviews);*/
 
 
 
             if (inst.settings.searchFormTmpl) {
                 dataLayerForFirst('autocomplete', lang , region);
             }
             else{
                 dataLayerForFirst('dropdown', lang , region);
             }
 
             bcrm.bind("currencies_loaded", function () {
                 $('.lrv_offer:first').click();
             });
 
         });
 
     });
        </script>
        <div id="bcrm_currency_cont" style="display:none">
         <div class="group main">
          <span class="main-title">
           Währung
          </span>
          <div class="bcrm_currency_settings_popular">
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="group all-other">
          <span class="sub-title">
           Alle Währungen:
          </span>
          <div class="bcrm_currency_settings_other">
          </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         var lang = 'de';
 
     
 
         var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
         popup.delegate('.bcrm_currency_settings_item', 'click', function(){
             self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
             var curr = $(this).data('item');
 
             $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
             $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
             self.settingsPopup.curr = curr;
             self.settingsPopup.lang = (self.settingsPopup.lang) ? self.settingsPopup.lang : lang;
             $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', curr);
 
             $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
             $(this).addClass('picked');
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
         });
        </script>

   <script>
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
                 window.showMobileBanner = function(){
                     var banner = $('#js_mobile_banner');
                     if(!banner.length || bcrm.prototype.settings.btag ==='admitad') return;
                     var isAndroid = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i) != null;
                     var isIOS = navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone|iPad|iPod/i) != null;
                     if((isAndroid || isIOS) && !readCookie('mobile_banner_closed'))
                         setTimeout(function () {
 
                             $('.js_mobile_app', banner).hide();
                             if (isAndroid) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="google-play"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
                             else if (isIOS) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="ios"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
 
                             banner.animate({'bottom': '0'}, 300, function () {
                                 $('.js_mobile_banner_close', banner).click(function () {
                                     createCookie('mobile_banner_closed', true);
                                     banner.animate({'bottom': '-128px'}, 300);
                                 });
                             });
                         }, 1000);
                 }
                 if(navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i)){window.showMobileBanner();}
             });
   </script>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var cFinger = readCookie('fingerId');
 
 if(cFinger == undefined || cFinger == 0) {
     var options = {
         //excludeUserAgent: true,
         ie_activex: true
     }
     var fip = {};
     new Fingerprint2(options).get(function(result, components){
         fip.id = result;
     });
     var fpid = (fip.id) ? fip.id : 0;
     createCookie('fingerId', fpid, 3650);
 }
 
 
 var cGaId = readCookie('gaClientId');
 if(cGaId == undefined || cGaId == 0) {
     var counter = 1;
     function checkIfAnalyticsLoaded() {
        if ($.isFunction(window.ga) && $.isFunction(window.ga.getAll)) {
            createCookie('gaClientId', window.ga.getAll()[0].get('clientId'), 3650);
        } else {
            counter = counter + 1;
            if (counter < 10){
                setTimeout('checkIfAnalyticsLoaded()', 400);
            }
        }
     }
     var isFrontPage = '1';
     var carRental = testCarRentalPage();

   <div aria-hidden="false" class="modal custom-popup fade" id="AffiliatePortal" style="display: none">
    <div class="modal-dialog custom-margin">
     <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-header">
       <button aria-label="Close" class="btn-close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
        <i class="icon-header-close">
        </i>
       </button>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">
       <iframe class="affiliate_portal" src="about:blank">
       </iframe>

   <script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
 
         var affiliateIframe = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal');
         var affiliateLink = 'https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login?ReturnUrl=%2faffiliate-portal/';
         var iframeContext = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal').contentDocument; 
         var affiliateHomeLink = "https://economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Home/";
         var iframe_affil = $('iframe.affiliate_portal');
         function initIframeButtons() {
             $('.affiliate_portal').contents().find('#loginForm a[type="submit"]').click(function(){
                 window.location.href = "https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/ResetPassword/";
             });
         };
 
         $("#js_affiliate_portal a").click(function(){
                iframe_affil.attr("src",affiliateLink);
                 $(window).resize(function(){
                     if($('#AffiliatePortal').width() < 660){
                         $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('hide');
                     }
                 });
                 
                 if(iframeContext &&(iframeContext.cookie).indexOf('.ASPXAUTH') !== -1){
                     window.location.href = affiliateHomeLink;
                 };
                 initIframeButtons();
                 $(affiliateIframe).on('load',function(){
                     if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href.indexOf('https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login') === -1 ){
                         window.location.href = affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href;
                     } 
                     initIframeButtons();
                 });
 
                 if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href !== affiliateLink){
                     affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href = affiliateLink;
                 } 
 
                 $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('show');
             
         });
     });
   </script>

     var selected = {"code":"DE","phoneCode":49,"id":81,"name":"Deutschland","p":240,"lang":"de","selected":true,"wrap":"start"};
 
     
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r = $('.js_settings_popup_cor', popup);
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     r.delegate('.js_popup_item', 'click', function(){
         var cor = $(this).data('item');
         var lang = (corAll[cor].lang) ? corAll[cor].lang : 'en';
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
         var countryCurrencies = bcrm.getCountryCurrency();
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         for (var curr in countryCurrencies) {
             if (countryCurrencies.hasOwnProperty(curr) && $.inArray(cor, countryCurrencies[curr]) != -1) {
                 var crCurr = curr;
             }
         }
 
         if(typeof crCurr == 'undefined'){
             crCurr = 'EUR';
         }
 
         $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', crCurr);
 
         self.settingsPopup = {
             cr : cor,
             lang : lang,
             curr : crCurr,
             dest : dest
         };
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r).removeClass('picked');
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
 
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         var langPicked = $('.js_popup_item[data-item="'+lang+'"]:first', r_lang);
         var currPicked = $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item[data-item="'+crCurr+'"]');
         langPicked.addClass('picked');
         currPicked.addClass('picked');
 
         $('.js_settings_cor_title', popup).text(corAll[cor].name);
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text(langPicked.data('name'));
         if(currPicked.data('name'))
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text(currPicked.data('name'));
 
     });
 
 
     $(document).ready(function(){
         if(selected) {
             $('.js_settings_cor_title').text(selected.name);
             $('.js_settings_cor_flag').addClass(selected.code.toLowerCase());
             $('.js_settings_cor_txt').text(selected.code.toUpperCase());
         }
 
     });
          </script>

 
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).click(function(){
         self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
         var lang = $(this).data('item');
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         self.settingsPopup.lang = lang;
         self.settingsPopup.dest = dest;
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
     });

        languageAction();
 
        $('.js_language_short').text(lang1.toUpperCase());
        $('.js_settings_lang_title').text(name);
        $('.js_language_flag').addClass(lang1);
    });

     <script>
      window.onload = function() {
       
             $("#js_cookies-popup-agree").bind("click",function(){
             $(".js_cookie-popup").hide();
             createCookie("agreedToCookies","true");
             });
             if(readCookie("agreedToCookies") === null){
                 $(".js_cookie-popup").show();
             }
         
     }
     </script>

     <script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function(){
                     var loadPartners = function(){
                         $(window).unbind("scroll");
                         $(window).unbind("resize");
                         setTimeout(function () {
                             $.ajax({
                                 url: "partner_feedback_print_html",
                                 cache: false,
                                 success: function (html) {
                                     $(".js_feedback_cont").html(html);
                                 }
                             });
                         }, 50);
                     };
                     var initPartnersLoading = function(){
                         var feedbackWrap = $(".js_feedback_cont");
                         var boxTopPositon =  feedbackWrap[0].getBoundingClientRect().top;
                         if (!feedbackWrap.length){
                             $(window).unbind("scroll");
                             $(window).unbind("resize");
                             return;
                         }
                         var windowHeight = $(window).height();
 
                         if (boxTopPositon < windowHeight){
                             loadPartners();
                         }
                     };
                 
                     $(window).bind("scroll", initPartnersLoading);
                     $(window).bind("resize", initPartnersLoading);
                     initPartnersLoading();
                     BcrmApiWrapper.getAvgCustomerRating(populateAvgRating, 21);
                 });
     </script>

        <script>
         var lang = 'de';
 var dNumber = '+44 203 478 5239';
 var jdata = '[{"id":233,"code":"UK","phone":"+44 203 478 5239","name":"UK"},{"id":81,"code":"DE","phone":"800 180 40 08","name":"Germany"},{"id":231,"code":"UA","phone":"800 50 11 47","name":"Ukraine"},{"id":183,"code":"RU","phone":"+7 495 989 9858","name":"Russia"},{"id":207,"code":"ES","phone":"+34 9 1791 1261","name":"Spain"},{"id":177,"code":"PL","phone":"+48 2 2212 0618","name":"Poland"},{"id":108,"code":"IT","phone":"+39 06 4523 0451","name":"Italy"},{"id":121,"code":"LV","phone":"+371 6 601 0858","name":"Latvia"},{"id":107,"code":"IL","phone":"+972 3721 9636","name":"Israel"},{"id":14,"code":"AU","phone":"+61 280 733 414","name":"Austria"},{"id":213,"code":"SE","phone":"+46 8 5051 3532","name":"Sweden"},{"id":74,"code":"FR","phone":"+33 17 09 186 12","name":"France"},{"id":31,"code":"BR","phone":"+55 613 717 51 11","name":"Brazil"},{"id":98,"code":"HK","phone":"+852 580 859 11","name":"Hong Kong"},{"id":39,"code":"CA","phone":"+1 613 701 09 11","name":"Canada"},{"id":214,"code":"CH","phone":"+41 315 280 911","name":"Switzerland"},{"id":22,"code":"BE","phone":"+32 258 849 11","name":"Belgium"},{"id":[234,10,11,27,44,48,53,56,62,63,65,76,87,89,94,97,138,142,159,171,173,174,179,185,189,236,239],"code":"US","phone":"1 202 800 9938","name":"USA"}]';
 var region = 'EU';
 var url = '/de';
 var abTesting = +'0';
 var abTestingExpId = '5sUuKLSySv-DJ9TF5df-vg';
 
 
     $(document).ready(function() {
         var isTest = document.location.hostname !== 'www.economybookings.com';
         var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i) != null;
 
 
         window.expVar = abTesting;
         window.expId = abTestingExpId;
 
         window.bcrmSettings = {
             proxyUrl: '/prx.php',
             language: lang,
             watermarkAutocomplite : true,
             calendarDateFormat: 'dd M',
             searchResultUrl : url+'/cars/results',
             jsErrorHandlerUrl : '/qjs.php?m=e',
 
             shortTimeFormat: [234],
             calendarFirstDay : [234, 235],
             pickupDaysFromNow: 4,
             currencyInSettings: true,
             plusCalendarPickupForDropoff: 4,
             showAlertInSearchForm: false,
             dropoffDaysFromNow: 8,
             addVtoCss: true,
             defaultTime: '1000',
             isHoverFlexBox: true,
             sortByScoreOnly : false,
             corsOn12Steps: false,
             isQueryParam : true,
             method : 'showSearch',
             newCalendar : abTesting === 1,
             defaultAutocomplite : getDefaultForAutoCompletePage(),
             showCalendarAfterPickLocation : true
         };
 
 
         var inst = bcrm(window.bcrmSettings);
         if (window.bcrmSettings.method) inst[window.bcrmSettings.method]();
 
         showSupportPhoneNumber(dNumber, jdata);
 
         bcrm.bind('user_identified', function (r, data) {
             if (data['code'] == 'US' || data['code'] == 'CA' || data['code'] == 'AG' || data['code'] == 'AR' || data['code'] == 'BS' || data['code'] == 'BB' || data['code'] == 'BZ' || data['code'] == 'BO' || data['code'] == 'BR' || data['code'] == 'VE' || data['code'] == 'HT' || data['code'] == 'GY' || data['code'] == 'GT' || data['code'] == 'GD' || data['code'] == 'HN' || data['code'] == 'DM' || data['code'] == 'DO' || data['code'] == 'CO' || data['code'] == 'CR' || data['code'] == 'CU' || data['code'] == 'MX' || data['code'] == 'NI' || data['code'] == 'PA' || data['code'] == 'PY' || data['code'] == 'PE' || data['code'] == 'SV' || data['code'] == 'VC' || data['code'] == 'KN' || data['code'] == 'LC' || data['code'] == 'SR' || data['code'] == 'TT' || data['code'] == 'UY' || data['code'] == 'CL' || data['code'] == 'EC' || data['code'] == 'JM') {
                 $("#world-phone-number").hide();
                 $("#usa-phone-number").show();
             }
         });
 
         var modalPopup = $('#SignIn');
         if(modalPopup.length && getParameterByName('op') === 'reg') {
             $('.login_form_show:first').click();
             if(getParameterByName('mail')){
                 $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(getParameterByName('mail'));
             }else{
                 if(!readCookie('clientId')) createCookie('clientId', getParameterByName('clientid'), 3650);
                 var clientId = readCookie('clientId');
                 if(clientId)
                     bcrm.getJSON(inst.settings.proxyUrl + '&m=s&c=getclientemailbyclientid/' + clientId, function (data) {
                         if(data.Email){
                             $('#loginEmail', modalPopup).val(data.Email);
                         }
                     });
             }
         }
 
         bcrm.bind('search_form_loaded', function (r) {
             /*BcrmApiWrapper.getReviews(0, getReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getFeefoReviews(getFeefoReviews);
             BcrmApiWrapper.getKiyohReviews(getKiyohReviews);*/
 
 
 
             if (inst.settings.searchFormTmpl) {
                 dataLayerForFirst('autocomplete', lang , region);
             }
             else{
                 dataLayerForFirst('dropdown', lang , region);
             }
 
             bcrm.bind("currencies_loaded", function () {
                 $('.lrv_offer:first').click();
             });
 
         });
 
     });
        </script>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         var lang = 'de';
 
     
 
         var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
         popup.delegate('.bcrm_currency_settings_item', 'click', function(){
             self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
             var curr = $(this).data('item');
 
             $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
             $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
             self.settingsPopup.curr = curr;
             self.settingsPopup.lang = (self.settingsPopup.lang) ? self.settingsPopup.lang : lang;
             $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', curr);
 
             $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
             $(this).addClass('picked');
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
         });
        </script>

   <script>
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
                 window.showMobileBanner = function(){
                     var banner = $('#js_mobile_banner');
                     if(!banner.length || bcrm.prototype.settings.btag ==='admitad') return;
                     var isAndroid = navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i) != null;
                     var isIOS = navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone|iPad|iPod/i) != null;
                     if((isAndroid || isIOS) && !readCookie('mobile_banner_closed'))
                         setTimeout(function () {
 
                             $('.js_mobile_app', banner).hide();
                             if (isAndroid) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="google-play"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
                             else if (isIOS) $('.js_mobile_app[data-app="ios"]', banner).css({'display': 'inline-block'});
 
                             banner.animate({'bottom': '0'}, 300, function () {
                                 $('.js_mobile_banner_close', banner).click(function () {
                                     createCookie('mobile_banner_closed', true);
                                     banner.animate({'bottom': '-128px'}, 300);
                                 });
                             });
                         }, 1000);
                 }
                 if(navigator.userAgent.match(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i)){window.showMobileBanner();}
             });
   </script>
   <title>
    Günstige Autovermietung in Europa und weltweit

    <div class="modal-dialog custom-margin">
     <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-header">
       <button aria-label="Close" class="btn-close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
        <i class="icon-header-close">
        </i>
       </button>

   <script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
 
         var affiliateIframe = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal');
         var affiliateLink = 'https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login?ReturnUrl=%2faffiliate-portal/';
         var iframeContext = document.querySelector('.affiliate_portal').contentDocument; 
         var affiliateHomeLink = "https://economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Home/";
         var iframe_affil = $('iframe.affiliate_portal');
         function initIframeButtons() {
             $('.affiliate_portal').contents().find('#loginForm a[type="submit"]').click(function(){
                 window.location.href = "https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/ResetPassword/";
             });
         };
 
         $("#js_affiliate_portal a").click(function(){
                iframe_affil.attr("src",affiliateLink);
                 $(window).resize(function(){
                     if($('#AffiliatePortal').width() < 660){
                         $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('hide');
                     }
                 });
                 
                 if(iframeContext &&(iframeContext.cookie).indexOf('.ASPXAUTH') !== -1){
                     window.location.href = affiliateHomeLink;
                 };
                 initIframeButtons();
                 $(affiliateIframe).on('load',function(){
                     if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href.indexOf('https://www.economybookings.com/affiliate-portal/Account/Login') === -1 ){
                         window.location.href = affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href;
                     } 
                     initIframeButtons();
                 });
 
                 if(affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href !== affiliateLink){
                     affiliateIframe.contentWindow.location.href = affiliateLink;
                 } 
 
                 $('#AffiliatePortal').modal('show');
             
         });
     });
   </script>

             for more benefits!

     var selected = {"code":"DE","phoneCode":49,"id":81,"name":"Deutschland","p":240,"lang":"de","selected":true,"wrap":"start"};
 
     
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r = $('.js_settings_popup_cor', popup);
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     r.delegate('.js_popup_item', 'click', function(){
         var cor = $(this).data('item');
         var lang = (corAll[cor].lang) ? corAll[cor].lang : 'en';
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
         var countryCurrencies = bcrm.getCountryCurrency();
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         for (var curr in countryCurrencies) {
             if (countryCurrencies.hasOwnProperty(curr) && $.inArray(cor, countryCurrencies[curr]) != -1) {
                 var crCurr = curr;
             }
         }
 
         if(typeof crCurr == 'undefined'){
             crCurr = 'EUR';
         }
 
         $('#bcrm_currency_cont').attr('data-selected', crCurr);
 
         self.settingsPopup = {
             cr : cor,
             lang : lang,
             curr : crCurr,
             dest : dest
         };
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r).removeClass('picked');
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item').removeClass('picked');
 
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         var langPicked = $('.js_popup_item[data-item="'+lang+'"]:first', r_lang);
         var currPicked = $('.bcrm_currency_settings_item[data-item="'+crCurr+'"]');
         langPicked.addClass('picked');
         currPicked.addClass('picked');
 
         $('.js_settings_cor_title', popup).text(corAll[cor].name);
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text(langPicked.data('name'));
         if(currPicked.data('name'))
             $('.bcrm_currency_short_code', popup).text(currPicked.data('name'));
 
     });
 
 
     $(document).ready(function(){
         if(selected) {
             $('.js_settings_cor_title').text(selected.name);
             $('.js_settings_cor_flag').addClass(selected.code.toLowerCase());
             $('.js_settings_cor_txt').text(selected.code.toUpperCase());
         }
 
     });
          </script>
         </div>

 
 
     var popup = $('.js_settings_popup_content');
     var r_lang = $('.js_settings_popup_lang', popup);
 
     $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).click(function(){
         self.settingsPopup = (self.settingsPopup) ? self.settingsPopup : {};
         var lang = $(this).data('item');
         var dest = (langAll[lang] && langAll[lang].dest !== 'javascript:void(0);') ? langAll[lang].dest : false;
 
         $('.js_settings_popup_close').hide();
         $('.js_settings_popup_confirm').show();
 
         self.settingsPopup.lang = lang;
         self.settingsPopup.dest = dest;
 
         $('.js_popup_item', r_lang).removeClass('picked');
         $(this).addClass('picked');
         $('.js_settings_lang_title', popup).text($(this).data('name'));
     });
 
 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        languageAction();
 
        $('.js_language_short').text(lang1.toUpperCase());
        $('.js_settings_lang_title').text(name);
        $('.js_language_flag').addClass(lang1);
    });

     <script>
      window.onload = function() {
       
             $("#js_cookies-popup-agree").bind("click",function(){
             $(".js_cookie-popup").hide();
             createCookie("agreedToCookies","true");
             });
             if(readCookie("agreedToCookies") === null){
                 $(".js_cookie-popup").show();
             }
         
     }

     <script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function(){
                     var loadPartners = function(){
                         $(window).unbind("scroll");
                         $(window).unbind("resize");
                         setTimeout(function () {
                             $.ajax({
                                 url: "partner_feedback_print_html",
                                 cache: false,
                                 success: function (html) {
                                     $(".js_feedback_cont").html(html);
                                 }
                             });
                         }, 50);
                     };
                     var initPartnersLoading = function(){
                         var feedbackWrap = $(".js_feedback_cont");
                         var boxTopPositon =  feedbackWrap[0].getBoundingClientRect().top;
                         if (!feedbackWrap.length){
                             $(window).unbind("scroll");
                             $(window).unbind("resize");
                             return;
                         }
                         var windowHeight = $(window).height();
 
                         if (boxTopPositon < windowHeight){
                             loadPartners();
                         }
                     };
                 
                     $(window).bind("scroll", initPartnersLoading);
                     $(window).bind("resize", initPartnersLoading);
                     initPartnersLoading();
                     BcrmApiWrapper.getAvgCustomerRating(populateAvgRating, 21);
                 });
     </script>
